content.rendered:
Senior Affiliate Manager

Are you an ambitious and results-driven professional with a passion for affiliate marketing? We have an exciting opportunity for an experienced Affiliate Manager to join us at KNG Group.

As our Senior Affiliate Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving our affiliate marketing strategy to new heights. You will be responsible for cultivating strong partnerships, optimizing affiliate performance, and devising innovative campaigns to attract a wider audience. In return for your dedication, we offer an exceptional salary package, an aggressive commission structure, and a flexible working environment that empowers you to thrive.

Don’t miss this chance to be part of a dynamic and rapidly growing industry. Apply now and embark on an extraordinary journey with us!

Responsibilities

  • Overseeing the day-to-day management of affiliate accounts to ensure maximum ROI is achieved
  • Responsibility for sourcing new affiliates in order to drive brand growth
  • Identify and cultivate top performers and develop incentive programs to reward key partners
  • Create monthly promotions and communications to affiliate marketers
  • Collaborate with internal teams to regularly create and improve landing pages, overall marketing, and merchandising campaigns through the affiliate network
  • Develop new affiliate recruitment and program marketing campaigns
  • Responsible for running affiliate accounts whilst ensuring delivery of personal and group KPI’s
  • To be the company’s main representative at events, conferences and awards ceremonies.
  • Implement strategies to increase quality and yield of key affiliate partners
  • Represent the affiliate team at industry events and keep updated on industry trends.
  • Manage key accounts across all brands and increase business from mid to top-tier affiliates.
  • Work with internal marketing team to grow the affiliate business within the market
  • To provide reports to the senior management team on daily/weekly/monthly performance.
  • To ensure that all affiliate payments are checked against reporting and paid in a timely manner.
  • To drive traffic in target geos to meet the business growth strategy.

Skills & Experience

  • At least 3 years of experience in an affiliate manager role within the iGaming industry
  • Experience with both sportsbook and casino products
  • Experience in unregulated markets
  • Must have their own industry affiliate connections
  • Great communicator
  • In-depth knowledge and experience of leading global affiliates
  • Methodical, numbers driven and well organized
  • Fluent in English
  • Positive and enthusiastic ‘can do –attitude’
  • Possess strong sales, negotiation, and presentation skills.

Should you feel that your a good match, please apply by completing the application form below or emailing your CV and cover letter to lena@kngpartners.com
